name: Aurelia: Stellar Arising
description:
No Ads!

Aurelia: Stellar Arising - 3D Turn-based Fleet vs. Fleet Space Combat Game. Choose between two factions and fight for control of the Aurelia System in over 77 missions per faction. Control fleets of up to 9 ships and give maneuver and tactical commands to each ship.

Fight through 2 campaigns with 7 phases and 11 missions each to earn maximum rewards and unlock new ships and powerful new upgrades. 150+ Missions to experience and master. 20 total ships (10 per faction) and 18 ship specific upgrades.

Supports 3 different major game modes (Hybrid-Combat, Turn-Based, Team Turns). 5 Levels of difficulty for mission and campaign play. Additional campaign and battle customization options include support for Arcade, Balanced, and Simulation modes as well as Basic and Advanced AI. Play modes include Player Vs. AI, Player Vs. Player, and AI Vs. AI.

Includes a custom battle mode to configure user created battles with full customization of a fleet battle simulator. Enjoy a vast variety of configurations to create your own 9v9 battle simulation. Chose from 19 different battle deployment settings that include: Random, Head-2-Head, Chase/Chased, Back-2-Back, 2x Parallels, 4x Flanks, 8x Obliques with advantageous and disadvantaged positions.

Command & Control 20 Unique Ships - Classes: Gunship, Patrol Craft, Corvette, Frigate, Destroyer – 2 Types of each per faction for a total of 20 unique ships.
Engage Enemies with 10x Unique Weapon Systems That Consist Of: Auto-Cannons, Auxiliary Batteries, Main Batteries, Missile Launchers, Torpedo Launchers With 100x Ballistic Configurations.

Utilize the Fleet Manager to customize your fleet with hundreds of formation combinations. War Factory to purchase new ships and sell no longer used ships. Ship Viewer to upgrade your ships with over ship specific upgrades.

No Ads!
